title: Ramen Fighter Miki
alternative_title: Muteki Kanban Musume, 無敵看板娘
description: Miki Onimaru is a poster girl that works at her mother’s Chinese ramen restaurant. She appears to be a normal girl, but she can become very violent if provoked. She picks a fight with her mother and accquaintances as a result on an almost daily basis, causing a series of troubling mishaps in their otherwise normal lives.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> Parody>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
